casebody.data:
NC DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY
v.
LEDFORD 223PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 3, 2017 Joseph Finarelli, Special Deputy Attorney General, for North Carolina Department of Public Safety. Larry Leake, Attorney at Law, Asheville, Jamie A. Stokes, Attorney at Law, for Ledford, Chauncey John. J. Michael McGuinness, Attorney at Law, Elizabethtown, Megan Ashley Milliken, Attorney at Law, for Southern States Police Benevolent Association, et al. Michael C. Byrne, Attorney at Law, Norris Arden Adams, II, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for State Employees Association of North Carolina and North Carolina Fraternal Order of Police.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of April 2017 by Petitioner to Withdraw Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of April 2017."
